=== (*) Notes and recipes ===

Everything in this laptop is working out of the box. Great choice for Ubuntu desktop.

==== Working function keys ====
* Fn-ESC mute
* Fn-F3 suspend
* Fn-F6 Brightness down
* Fn-F7 Brightness up
